sections.heading: Act, how cited.Sections 46-501 to 46-573 may be known and cited as Reclamation Act, the districts created hereunder may be termed reclamation districts; and the bonds which may be issued hereunder may be called reclamation district bonds, which designation may be engraved or printed on their face

46-501 to 46-573 may be known and cited as Reclamation Act, the districts created hereunder may be termed reclamation districts; and the bonds which may be issued hereunder may be called reclamation district bonds, which designation may be engraved or printed on their face
